message.body: Thanks!
Got to town early, already out to dinner. Will be back later!
Sorry! Starving from being on the road. When is good for you?
Ah, ok. Well, I'm not planning on really being here much longer, and j and I will not be home maybe at all tonight. When can you make it over?
Yep! Prob about an hour
S'cool, I guess just come by when yr done with dinner, does that work for you?
Ok
Just got our entres! Ah! I'm so sorry it will be a little longer
Ok, no sweat.
I could go all night and meet ya but I just remembered I got up at 6 am... Well go out next weekend :)
Well ride safe, have fun and thanks for the couch!
K! We've actually just been hangin here, just leavin now
At your place now. Figured all the keys out and all. :)
Looks like I'll be stayin with y'all again tonight and possibly more, my friend got busy with work today but well just play it by ear!
Jeremy's cousin and her friend might be crashing with us tonight FYI. We can blow up the mattress, but just thought i'd letcha know
Ok. I'm trying read hard to move into the other place tonight.
Looks like I can move in until Friday. I'm just concerned about being able to sleep. Need to go to bed earlier than last night. If it's inconvenient for u guys I can get a hotel tonight.
It's no big deal, just gonna be crowded and we'll prolly be up late again...sorry. Ours is not the house for those with hectic schedules needing sleep :-)
Yea....i mean, you can crash in our room tonight if y'need...we'll all be coming home late (j and the cousins after band practice, 12 or 1) and I after a show and friend hangout, prolly 12.
So we might all just come home and crash...we can try to just stay out of the house until we're ready for bed
Haha, well, if you wanna set me up on the floor in your bedroom or somewhere that would be fine. I'll be out like a rock anyway :)
We'll keep ya posted, I'll see what j thinks, but you'll be welcome to the bed if that ends up being best.

K, so I think we're gonna be out late, if you think we'll wake you up by putting the air mattress out/getting them settled, then by all means just sleep upstairs and we'll all puppy pile in the living room. But I think we can avoid makin a ruckus/hangin
Thanks so much for lookin out for me. Where would you like me to crash?
Ok. What are y'all up to now?
Doesn't matter to us!
J's at band practice, and I'm at a friends show in the burbs. When ya konkin out?
Hey idk. Not really tired lol
Heh. Well, we might all go out in nolibs for a drink round 11:30/12 if ya wanna join! I'l letcha know!
We're at a bar close to the apt if you wanna join!
Hey, you round or outa town?
Just wakin up. The apt downtown fell through so now I'm in west mount airy haha.
Sorry, just got this. 'support
Ack, bad auto correct. 'sup?
Thanks girl :)
Oh no! Well let us know how it goes if you need somethin next week
Hey! What are you up to right now?
In center city with a couple hours to kill
I am taking a train to NYC tonight so I can't come... Maybe I can stop by the theater and see your set up now? If permitted I'd live to!
Love*
I have a performance tonight with my puppet group at 8! If yr free you should come. I'm setting up until then
Sweet, see ya soon
Sure! If you wanna help out, we could use some hands. We're at the rotunda, 40th and walnut
On the corner...
Hey girl, you goin to Kurt vile on Saturday?
Yea I'm baby sitting till 9:30 that night and show says it's at 8 so I'm going to try to make it too :)
I'm going to a show at the painted bride, not sure what time I'll be finished, but if it's early enough, maybe I could join ya....
